titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the Capitol Police Board should exercise the authority granted to it under law to exempt members of the United States Capitol Police with good service records from mandatory separation from employment at 57 years of age.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 10/20/1999--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that the Capitol Police Board should exercise its authority under Federal law to exempt from mandatory separation at age 57 those members of the U.S. Capitol Police with good service records.
